title: The Egg of oryzias latipes
brief_description: Artificial fertilization of the killifish. through constant research a method of artificial fertilization of the transparent eggs of killifish or oryzias latipes, in Ringer’s solution was discovered. The delayed-action camera shows the process observed through the microscope.
